meta.title: Charlie Jackson Comedian/Developer
meta.author: Charlie Jackson
meta.description: Comedian & JavaScript Developer (focus on React and React Native)

title: Charlie Jackson
heading: Comedian & JavaScript Developer
now: You may see me bumbling about London, UK doing improvised comedy a bit of stand-up and the occasional clowning performance. Any shows and such should be on my Twitter if you wanna come and throw some overly ripe apples.
I'm also a software developer. I build websites and mobile apps with JavaScript (mainly React and React Native). Find out more of that on LinkedIn or GitHub.
Outside of that I have a lot of personal projects all documented on my Project Journal. And do a bunch of writing which you can find here.

newsletter.text: I have an email newsletter for my shows, writing and projects.

shows.title: Graduation Show - Hoopla Standup Level 2 Course
shows.location: The Miller, 96 Snowsfields Road, London SE1 3SS, UK
